titleStmt.title: SII 7.540: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 540. (A.R. No. 314 of 1901). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
. svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇara puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka cayamātu virumpat taṉṉirupatumalar cūṭa maṉṉiya Urimaiyil maṇimuṭi cūṭic caeṅkol niṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷarppakka veṅkali nīkki meyyaṟan=taḻaippa kaliṅkameriyak kaṭama
lai naṭātti valaṅkoḷāḻi varaaiyāḻi naṭātti Irucuṭaraḷavum Orukuṭai niḻaṟṟa virasiṁhāsanattu mukkokkiḻānaṭikaḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya kopparakecaripaṟmarāna tribhuvanaccakravarttikaḷ śrīvikramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu Oṉpatāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇ
ṭalattuk kulottuṅkacoḻavaḷanāṭṭup peṟūrnāṭṭu maṇaṟpākkattu Ūrom Iṉnāṭṭuc curattūrnāṭṭup pallāpuramāṉa vāṉavaṉmāteviccaturvvedimaṅkalattu tiruccuramuṭaiyamahādevar koyilil Āticaṇṭeśvaraṟku nilavilai Āvaṇak kaiyeḻu
ttu Ittevaṟku tiruman=tiraponakattukku veṇṭum paṭikku Iṉnāṭṭup peṟūrnāṭṭu meṭṭiṉmeneṉmalippaḷḷi cāttai celvanāna toṇṭaināṭṭayyaṉ Eṅkaḷpakkal pon=niṭṭuk koṇṭu Iṟaiyiḻicci viṭukiṟa nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷur kiḻkaḻani maḻapaṭṭiyuṅ
kuṇṭiluṅ kuḻi nānūṟum paḷukkuvāṇiyaṉkaḻuval kuḻi muṉṉūṟum kīḻaikkaṭuṅkalippaṭṭi kuḻi Iruṉūṟṟu Eḻupatum Āka kuḻi toḷāyirat teḻupatukkum kīḻpāṟ kellai meṭṭiṉmeneṉmaliyil teṉkaḻanikku nīrpāyn=ta vāykkālukku meṟku
m teṉpāṟkellai Uvaccappaṭṭi vaṭavarampukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai Āṉai meṭṭukku nīrpāyn=ta vāykkālukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai melaikkaṭuṅkalip paṭṭit teṉvarampukku teṟkum kīḻaikkaṭuṅkalippaṭṭikku melpāṟkellai me
laikkaṭuṅkalippaṭṭit teṉvarampukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai nemiśvaramuṭaiyamahādevar devadānam viḷakkuppaṭṭiyiṉ teṉvarampukkut teṟkum Iṉnāṉkellai Akattuḻppaṭṭa nilam patiṉaṟucāṇkolāl kuḻi toḷāyiratteḻupatum tiruccuraviḷākame
ṉṉu nāmattāl Uṇmeṭoḻiviṉṟiyey Iṉnilattukku Uriya nīrum nīroṭukālum menokkiṉa maramum kīḻṇokkina kiṇaṟuṅ kiṇaṟṟil nīrum nīroṭukālum Uṇmeṭoḻiviṉṟi Iṉnāṉkellaiyakattu Uṭppaṭṭa nilattukku velikkācu Uṭpaṭa An=ta
rāyam nirvilai yeṉṟum Iṉnilam Uḻukuṭimakkaḷai Āḷvari veṭṭiyamañci Eccoṟu kūṟṟunelleṉṟu kāṭṭavuṅ koḷḷavum peṟātomākavum Ippaṭiyallatu ceyil gaṅgaiyiṭaikkumari
Digital edition of SII 7.540 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
